description: Expand scenario library from 14 to 112 scenarios across 5 domains: Foreign Languages (7 languages), English Communication, Cross-Cultural Communication, Leadership Courses, and Ethics & Philosophy Electives

userStories.title: Create centralized scenario data file with extended interface
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a centralized scenario data file with the extended TypeScript interface so that 112 scenarios can be managed in one place.
acceptanceCriteria: Create `src/data/scenarios.ts` with extended Scenario interface including: id, title, subtitle, course, difficulty, difficultyLevel, description, image, area, courseCode (existing) plus situation, dilemma, briefing, frameworks, primaryMission, successCriteria, tags (new common) plus language, semester, actflLevel, ilrLevel, cefrLevel, gseRange, keyVocabulary, culturalTips, culturalGotchas (language-specific)
Move existing 14 scenarios from MidshipmanScenarios.tsx to new file
Export `scenarios` array and `Scenario` type
Typecheck passes (npm run build)
userStories.notes: Completed 2026-01-22. Created src/data/scenarios.ts with extended interface supporting all fields. All 14 existing scenarios moved. TypeScript build passes.
